value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Do I hear wedding bells? The
brides are on their way! Get
ready, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Commander Anna! Now YOU have to
slow down and explain all this
to our friend here.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Everyone adores a June bride,
right? Now's the time!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|Hey! Commander Anna!
Well, there she goes.$k$pWe'd better get a move on
if we don't want to lose sight
of her.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Here we are...just in time for the
festival! It's a long-held tradition—
to bless brides with happy marriages.$k$pToday, a group of young women will
gather here, each one dressed
as a bride.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I never would have guessed you
have marriage on your mind,
Commander Anna!$k$pDon't dare forget to invite me to the
wedding!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Listen up, Sharena. This is
important. Marriage is never easy...$k$pBut legend holds that the one who
gets their hands on the ceremonial
Wedding Bouquet is blessed—$k$pno, guaranteed—a happy marriage!$k$p$EFace_Cool|This isn't some stuffy ceremony! It's
a winner-take-all battle of the brides! $k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シーダ,ch01_17_Sheeda_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Good afternoon! Have you joined us
today because you wish to become
brides?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|See? The competition is already
lining up! Get ready for a bridal brawl!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁リン,ch03_00_Lin_F_Wedding17,Face|$w0|Looks like you want the Wedding
Bouquet even more than I do!$k$pThere's no way I'm giving in so easily.
I'm going to go train. You'd better get
ready—I'll be back!$k$p$Sbs150|
